A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The film, based on a short story by Raymond Carver, uses flashbacks to explain the origins of the hatred and ultimately what drives and fuels the mother’s rage.
